title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the alias names set for the columns.
EB: The expression builder should display the alias names that were set for the columns in the dataset when selecting the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new datasource and dataset. 
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset from the available options. 
5. Note that the expression builder still shows the old column names instead of the alias names for the columns in the dataset.
